script: There my phone goes again, taunting me with a flicker of hope.
Well... better check the latest promotional message from my dear mobile carrier...

script.value: I know what you did last weekend.

script: It's probably some idiot claiming to have a webcam recording of me masturbating.
Sorry, man. No money. No friends. No one who cares.
All I have is a need for human interaction and this UNO reverse card...

script.value: Who is this? Also, that's not true!
Completing Castlevania for the 167th time and attempting to make an origami cat out of an old pizza box doesn't count.

script: Shit. That's odd, but I did tweet that. Always thought my three followers were bots.

options: It was a pretty good origami cat, though. Right?

script.value: Doesn't matter. You're lazy and self-destructive.
That's why you're here now, contemplating your failures.
You've had no significant impact on anyone's life. [flora] hates you. You have no special talents. You've never even had an interesting science fair project!
Some of it is bad luck. Most of it is your own doing.
I've never seen anyone make so many poor choices in life. It saddens me.

options.reply: No, I'm not. But I have something to tell you about those choices. Something life-changing!

options.value: Is this the NSA? I can explain the browser history...
options.reply: No. But I have something to tell you about those choices. Something life-changing!

options.value: And all those choices have led me to you. Are you the woman I've been waiting for all my life?
options.reply: No, I'm not. But I have something to tell you about those choices. Something life-changing!

script.value: All you need to do is tell me your name.

options.reply: My name isn't important. If you want to know what I have to say, tell me yours.

options.value: Are you also after my credit card number? You're going to be disappointed.
options.reply: What? No! If you want to know what I have to say, tell me your name.

options.value: Hold up. Are you a Nigerian prince, by any chance?
options.reply: What? No! If you want to know what I have to say, tell me your name.

script: It's probably a scammer, but what do I have to lose?
